mean_cn: n. 征收，强加，欺骗，不公平的负担
mean_en: a demand or request that is not reasonable or that causes trouble for someone
word_etyma: impos强加 + i + tion名词后缀 → imposition 强加，征税
short_phrase: the imposition of new rules on the man
sentence: It was an imposition to ask her to finish these tasks in one day.
sentence_trans: 要她一天之内完成这些工作太强人所难了。
